inlineContent.text: The controller supports multiple operations to manage users.
It allows updating/deleting users, following, muting, etc.

abstract.text: Controller for support shared functionality of ActivityPub.
Controller which exposes Well-Known functionality (webfinger, nodeinfo, host-meta).
Controller for managing user’s follow requests.
Controls basic operations for instance rules.
Controls basic operations for avatar image for user object.
Controller which expose information about specific instance configuration.
Controller for managing list of user’s notifications.
Controller for exporting data from Vernissage.
Controls basic operations for instance blocked domains.
Application which is main API component for Vernissage photos sharing platform.
Controller for support od basic ActivityPub endpoints.
Controller for adding new user into the system.
Controls basic operations for headers image for user object.
Sign in to the system by external identity providers (OAuth).
Controls basic operations for web push subscriptions.
Exposing health status of the system components.
